solution_line_template: There are {initial_doctors} doctors - {doctors_quit} doctors = <<{initial_doctors}-{doctors_quit}={doctors_left}>>{doctors_left} doctors left.
There are {initial_nurses} nurses - {nurses_quit} nurses = <<{initial_nurses}-{nurses_quit}={nurses_left}>>{nurses_left} nurses left.
In total there are {doctors_left} doctors + {nurses_left} nurses = <<{doctors_left}+{nurses_left}={total_left}>>{total_left} doctors and nurses left.
